robotMessage.DE: Gehst du zur Schule, an die Uni oder machst eine Ausbildung?
robotMessage.GB: Are you going to school, university, or doing an apprenticeship?
robotMessage.US: Are you in school, college, or doing an apprenticeship?
robotMessage.AU: Are you at school, uni, or doing an apprenticeship?
robotMessage.ES: ¿Vas al colegio, a la universidad o estás haciendo una formación?

robotMessageUniversity.DE: Perfekt! An welcher Uni bist du?
robotMessageUniversity.GB: Perfect! Which university are you at?
robotMessageUniversity.US: Perfect! What college are you at?

robotMessageSchool.GB: Which school do you go to?

robotMessageEducation.DE: Perfekt! In welchem Bereich machst du deine Ausbildung?
robotMessageEducation.GB: Perfect! In which field are you doing your apprenticeship?
robotMessageEducation.US: Perfect! What field is your trade school or apprenticeship in?
robotMessageEducation.AU: Perfect! What field’s your apprenticeship in?
robotMessageEducation.ES: ¡Perfecto! ¿En qué área estás haciendo tu formación profesional?

robotMessageSchool.DE: Nur noch eins: Welche Fächer darf ich für dich eintragen?
robotMessageSchool.GB: Just one more thing: Which subjects should I add for you?
robotMessageSchool.US: Just one more thing: Which subjects would you like me to add for you?
robotMessageSchool.AU: Just one more thing: Which subjects do you want me to add for you?
robotMessageSchool.ES: Solo una cosa más: ¿Qué asignaturas quieres que añada para ti?

robotMessageUniversity.DE: Fast geschafft! Was genau studierst du?
robotMessageUniversity.GB: Just one last thing before we finish! What’s your program or field of study?
robotMessageUniversity.US: Almost there! What’s your major or area of study?
robotMessageUniversity.AU: You're almost done! What’s your course or field of study?
robotMessageUniversity.ES: ¡Casi terminado! ¿En qué programa o área estás estudiando?
